Title: Best Buy Appoints Sima Sistani and Melinda Whittington to Board of Directors
Description:
(marketscreener.com) 
Best Buy Co., Inc. today announced that Sima Sistani, a seasoned media and technology leader, and Melinda Whittington, a leading executive in the furniture industry, have been appointed to its Board of Directors, effective immediately.
